snippet: The surprise bid has been questioned by some disability advocates who are worried about the college’s experience and the independence of the group’s board.
lead_paragraph: The surprise bid has been questioned by some disability advocates who are worried about the college’s experience and the independence of the group’s board.

headline.seo: Syracuse University Applies to Run Agency That Polices Abuse of Disabled People
headline.main: Syracuse University Applies to Run Agency That Polices Abuse of Disabled People
headline.print_headline: Syracuse University Applies to Run Agency That Polices Abuse of Disabled People
